auth/callback.title: OAuth
auth/callback.description: This is the OAuth callback page that handles user login after authentication.

auth/login.title: Entrance
auth/login.description: Login page where users can sign in using various OAuth providers.

auth/logout.title: Exit
auth/logout.description: Logout confirmation page where users can log out of their account.

index.title: Home
index.description: This is the main page of the application, displaying user information if logged in.
